channel.title: CVE Feed for ExpressTech -- Quiz And Survey Master (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ExpressTech -- Quiz And Survey Master (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2021-36864|2024-08-04T01:01:59.761Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (editor+) Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.4 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2021-36865|2024-08-04T01:01:59.772Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Insecure direct object references (IDOR) vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.4 at WordPress allows attackers to change the content of the quiz.

item.title: CVE-2021-36905|2024-08-04T01:01:59.899Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.4 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2021-36906|2024-08-04T01:01:59.835Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Insecure Direct Object References (IDOR) vulnerabilities in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.6 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2021-36863|2024-08-04T01:01:59.647Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.4 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2021-36898|2024-08-04T01:01:59.758Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. SQL Injection (SQLi) vulnerability in Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.4 on WordPress.
